# gxg-stack

<h2>Use of gxg-stack</h2>
<ul>
    <li>The <code>gxg-stack</code> element is used to evenly space a set of elements in the vertical axis</li>
</ul>

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description       | Type                                | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------- |
| `space`  | `space`   | The spacing value | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `"xs"`  |
